LanguageData.MicroelectronicsBasics.label: microelectronics
LanguageData.MicroelectronicsBasics.description: Work with complex microelectronics. This unlocks the high-tech research bench and comms console.
LanguageData.FlatscreenTelevision.label: flatscreen television
LanguageData.FlatscreenTelevision.description: Produce high-resolution flatscreen televisions for greater enjoyment.
LanguageData.ColoredLights.label: colored lights
LanguageData.ColoredLights.description: Construct colored lights for decorative purposes. Cosmetic only.
LanguageData.MoisturePump.label: moisture pump
LanguageData.MoisturePump.description: Construct moisture pumps, which very slowly normalize the moisture in the ground around them. They can turn wet ground dry and convert soft sand into normal sand.
LanguageData.HospitalBed.label: hospital bed
LanguageData.HospitalBed.description: Construct hospital beds which improve medical outcomes.
LanguageData.TransportPod.label: transport pod
LanguageData.TransportPod.description: Construct launchable transport pods that you can use to send people and supplies long distances across the planet's surface. Can be used for raiding, travel, sending gifts, and more.
LanguageData.MedicineProduction.label: medicine production
LanguageData.MedicineProduction.description: Produce standard industrial-tech medicine by combining herbal medicine, neutroamine, and cloth.
LanguageData.LongRangeMineralScanner.label: long-range mineral scanner
LanguageData.LongRangeMineralScanner.description: Construct long-range mineral scanners to detect precious minerals like gold or jade in across the planet. Requires advanced components to construct.
LanguageData.ShieldBelt.label: shield belt
LanguageData.ShieldBelt.description: Build shield belts, which use momentun-repulsion technology to block ranged attacks coming in or going out.
LanguageData.PrecisionRifling.label: precision rifling
LanguageData.PrecisionRifling.description: Craft precisely-machined guns like assault rifles and sniper rifles.
LanguageData.HeavyTurrets.label: autocannon turret
LanguageData.HeavyTurrets.description: Produce the heavy, long-ranged autocannon turret.
LanguageData.MultibarrelWeapons.label: multibarrel weapons
LanguageData.SniperTurret.label: sniper turret
LanguageData.SniperTurret.description: Produce the extremely long-ranged sniper cannon turret. It fires uranium slugs which tear through plasteel like paper, but it's less effective at close range.
